Text: This is NOT the original soundtrack recording. That's never been released. This is a recording made in the 1970s of the entire score conducted by Herrmann. Tempos are a bit different, especially in the title credits, which Herrmann conducted far faster there than in his subsequent studio recordings of the music. It's a fine album - hard to believe neither the soundtrack to "Psycho" or "North by Northwest" were issued when the films came out, though a truncated version of the "Vertigo" score was.
